channel.title: NSE:TATA on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Tata Steel Eyes Alternative Markets Due to Tariffs
item.description: Tata Steel CEO and MD, T.V. Narendran, says the company is planning to explore alternative markets due to rising tariff risks. Speaking exclusively to Bloomberg, Narendran also talks about the impact
